trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control with respect to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that the control implements.
trans-unit.target: 눈금 표시의 위치를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref> 와 관련 하 여 제어는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 컨트롤에서 구현 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The TickPlacement enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: TickPlacement 열거형 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 의 속성</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 을 설정 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에 나와 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>있는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 아래에 있는 눈금 표시</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> .

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to BottomRight.

Tick marks appear above and below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> bar for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the left and right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위와 아래에 눈금 표시가 표시는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 가로 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>, 왼쪽 및 오른쪽에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 세로 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 눈금 표시는 아래에 표시 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 가로 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>, 또는의 오른쪽에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 세로 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위에 표시 된 눈금 표시는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 가로 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>, 또는 왼쪽에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 세로 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>합니다.
